content: What popular toy consists of colorful interlocking plastic bricks and various other parts that can be assembled and reassembled into countless configurations?

Ah, you're referring to Lego bricks! They're these amazing little building blocks made of plastic that you can connect together in so many different ways. People of all ages love them because you can create anything your imagination comes up with—buildings, vehicles, characters, even whole cities. It's really fascinating how something so simple can be so versatile and enduringly popular.
